channel.title: Need help with tutorial
channel.description:
How to put your models over to other server:
1. open up the item.cfg doc and find the item u want to transport(or w/e) copy it and paste it in your server>item.cfg
example: PurplePk Project>Berky-scape Server>item.cfg Code:
item = 9003 Bandos_GodSword A_Bandos_Godsword. 1400000 1400000 1400000 135 135 135 1 1 10 10 10 10 10 190 2
(WARNING: DO NOT USE THIS CODE, SINCE THE CODE IS WRONG)
2. When you have done this, Go to your client doc.
3. open models doc in your client doc, then put in the wield model and drop model( and inventory model, not sure)
4. Then go to class8, copy the code and put it in your class8 doc, in your client folder
NOTE: THIS IS JUST A DAST 5MINS TUT MADE BY *******
Does this make anysense to transfer items from one source to another?

item.title: Need help with tutorial
item.dc:creator: @nick888 nick888
item.description:
@nick888 wrote:

How to put your models over to other server:

  1. open up the item.cfg doc and find the item u want to transport(or w/e)
    copy it and paste it in your server>item.cfg

example:
PurplePk Project>Berky-scape Server>item.cfg
Code:

item = 9003 Bandos_GodSword A_Bandos_Godsword. 1400000 1400000 1400000 135 135 135 1 1 10 10 10 10 10 190 2

(WARNING: DO NOT USE THIS CODE, SINCE THE CODE IS WRONG)

  1. When you have done this, Go to your client doc.

  2. open models doc in your client doc, then put in the wield model and drop model( and inventory model, not sure)

  3. Then go to class8, copy the code and put it in your class8 doc, in your client folder

NOTE: THIS IS JUST A DAST 5MINS TUT MADE BY *******

Does this make anysense to transfer items from one source to another?
